questions: What does CSS stand for?
answer: Cascading style sheet.

questions: What is the purpose of css?
answer: To allow HTML elements are to be displayed on screen, paper, or in other media.

questions: True or False: external style sheets are stored within CSS files?
answer: True.

questions: CSS can change the layout of a webpage?
answer: True.

questions: What is a CSS property?
answer: A property is a built in value that will specify what styling is being used i.e., color.

questions: What is a CSS value?
answer: It is the assigned styling that corresponds to the property i.e., property is color and the value is red.

questions: What is a CSS selector?
answer: It points to the HTML element you want to style.

questions: True or False: both properties and values end with a semi-colon.
answer: False. The property ends with a : and the value ends with a ;.

questions: True of False: declarations don't have to be separated by semi-colons?
answer: False, in oder for the CSS to be applied, each declaration must be separated by semi-colons.

questions: Are html elements reserved as CSS selectors?
answer: Yes, some elements such as p, div etc. are reserved css selectors.

questions: Can CSS use id's be used for styling?
answer: Yes.

questions: What is CSS flex box?
answer: It is used to style and position elements on the webpage.

questions: How is flex box used?
answer: Display: flex;

questions: Does flex box require display: flex in order to be functional?
answer: Yes, without display: flex, other css flex box properties can not be accessed.

questions: How do you algin content to the center with flex box?
answer: Display: flex; justify-content: center;

questions: How you you wrap text using flex box?
answer: Display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap

questions: Is flex bos or grid used more?
answer: flex box.

questions: Will text-align: center align a <div> into the middle of the page?
answer: No, this property only works on text. It will align the text to the center of the element it is nested in.

questions: What is the relationship between relative and absolute positioning?
answer: Anything that has relative positioning will be positioned relative to the absolute value.

questions: What will static positioning accomplish?
answer: Anything with static positioning will keep the position the at the same level on the page, even when scrolling.

questions: How can you make a comment is CSS?
answer: /* text goes here */

questions: True or False: comments can not span multiple lines ?
answer: False.

questions: What does RBG stand for?
answer: Red green blue.

questions: What is a HEX value?
answer: It is a specified color within CSS that uses a hexadecimal value that begins with #.

questions: Are color names reserved within CSS?
answer: Yes, CSS have color names reserved.

questions: What property would allow for a background image to be set?
answer: background-image: url('')
